This bill mandates the Department of Veterans Affairs to deny courses  that do not charge in-State tuition rates to veterans using certain  educational assistance under title 10. The VA already has the authority  to disapprove courses at higher education institutions that do not  offer in-State tuition rates for other GI Bill beneficiaries.

The Ravens scored a run in the bottom of the eighth inning to defeat  Yuma Catholic 1-0, earning their second straight State title and the  fourth title in the last 10 years.

This victory caps off an amazing season for the Ravens who finished  with an incredible record of 28 wins and only 1 loss.
